casebody.data:
State
v.
Andrew Darrin Ramseur 388A10-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2016 Mr. Daniel Shatz, Mr. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Mr. Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defenders, Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, For Ramseur, Andrew Darrin Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Ms. Amy Kunstling Irene, Mr. Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Ms. Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of June 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 27th day of July 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
